Constructs a sum expression

Constructs a sum expression

sum_expr(exp, ...)

Arguments

exp
an expression that can be expanded to a sum
...
bind variables in exp using dots. See examples.

Value

the expanded sum as an AST

Examples

sum_expr(x[i], i = 1:10)
#> x[1L] + x[2L] + x[3L] + x[4L] + x[5L] + x[6L] + x[7L] + x[8L] + 
#>     x[9L] + x[10L]
#>
